name: Heartstrike
description:
Welcome to "HeartStrike" - the ultimate card game where strategy and luck are equally important! In this game, two players compete with each other using their decks of ten cards and 15 life points. Each card is numbered from 0 to 9, and the game is played according to 33 rules.

At the beginning of the game, each player chooses a card from their deck without revealing it to their opponent. Once the attack phase starts, the cards of both players will be revealed, and the game will follow the 33 rules that determine the outcome of each round.

Are you ready to engage in a battle of wits and luck? Play "HeartStrike" today and find out if you have what it takes to emerge victorious!

Tips: If you start playing in a card battle, press the question mark (?) button to know how to play, tips, and card rules.

04/07/23:

04/08/23:

  •  I add more 6 card rules (27+6=33 card rules). When 3 number card attack with 7 number cards or 4 number card attack with 6 number cards will result in both losing a life.
  •  I added the card rule # after the card attack to know what rule it is.
  •  I added a skip button when you read the card rule.

04/10/23:
